title: Orion ODA System and Architecture
summary: Comprehensive overview of the Orion Ontology-Driven Architecture (ODA). Covers the transition to Antigravity Kernel v6.0 (Native Edition), featuring RSIL-enforced protocols and anti-hallucination verification. Includes the January 2026 comprehensive audit report documenting the final remediation of all findings (LLM routing, ActionRunner logging, LogicEngine, and mcp_manager exception fixes). Validated against Palantir AIP/Foundry (AI Ultra) standards and pushed to GitHub (origin/palantir).
